comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of large art pieces to be made, and y be the number of small art pieces to be made, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "4x + 2y \leq 100 (paint constraint)",
        "3x + y \leq 50 (glitter constraint)",
        "5x + 2y \leq 70 (glue constraint)",
        "x \geq 5 (minimum 5 large art pieces)",
        "y \geq 5 (minimum 5 small art pieces)"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 30x + 15y (profit)"
}
